name: TableTop Monster
description:
Early demo of a tabletop card game

Press space to roll dice, move and end turn.

when in an intersection press your numpad in the direction you want to go

6 for east

9 for north east

8 for north

7 for north west

4 for west

1 for south west

2 for south

3 for south east

In battle press b to fight, in a fight you both roll dice and the one with the highest dice roll plus power wins the round, it goes untill one of you either die or run

press r to run in a battle, but beware that if you run you risk taking a big hit!

the longer you stay in battle the easier it is to run.

thanks for playing!
